name: Wanderer
description: Born without roots, you drifted across lands and cultures. You adapt easily but often struggle to belong.

feature.name: Wayfarer's Lore
feature.description: You know a song, story, or saying from nearly every region. This grants advantage on Charisma checks when trying to fit in with unfamiliar cultures.

traits.text: I collect stories everywhere I go.
I speak with a mix of accents from many lands.
I am always ready to move on.
I make friends quickly but rarely keep them.
I am curious about every new culture.
I never sleep in the same place twice if I can help it.
I tell elaborate lies about my past.
I carry trinkets from every place I've visited.

ideals.text: Change. Nothing should stay the same forever.
Knowledge. Every journey teaches something new.
People. I'm loyal to my friends, not places.
Aspiration. Somewhere out there is a place I'll call home.
Escape. I run from my past.

bonds.text: I protect a song or story above all else.
A fellow traveler saved my life.
I seek a legendary place I heard about.
I left someone behind and regret it.
My instrument is my most precious possession.
I carry a map to somewhere I've never been.

flaws.text: I never stay to face consequences.
I cannot commit to anything or anyone.
I lie about my origins reflexively.
I am restless and bored easily.
I trust strangers over those who know me.
